rooms.description: Eco-friendly entrance with natural lighting and ventilation.
Spacious living room incorporating eco-friendly materials, ample windows for sunlight, open plan concept with access to balcony.
Fully-equipped kitchen utilizing energy-efficient appliances and locally sourced materials.
Open dining space with access to living room for social gatherings.
Primary bedroom optimized for privacy and natural light, including Vastu oriented alignment for wealth and health.
Secondary bedroom following eco-friendly principles with proper ventilation and sustainable materials.
Third bedroom, designed for flexibility as a guest room or home office, with Vastu principles.
Fourth bedroom offering space for additional storage and relaxation area in a sustainable manner.
Private bathroom integrated with the master bedroom, ensuring privacy and eco-friendly water fixtures.
Dedicated multimedia room with soundproofing and energy-efficient lighting.
Quiet reading area enriched with natural light and sustainable built-in bookshelves.

utilities.energy_efficiency: solar panels for electricity, LED lighting

levels.remarks: The design incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring the main entrance faces east and bedrooms face north or west. The garage is positioned on the ground floor for easy access while maintaining a harmonious flow with natural light and ventilation. Sustainable materials and energy solutions are prioritized.
